import React, {Component} from 'react'; import NavBar from './NavBar'; import { Button,Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Courses from '../Features/Courses'; import ProgressBar from 'react-bootstrap/ProgressBar' import{Link} from 'react-router-dom'; import firebase from '../firebase/base'; class AccInfo extends Component { render() { var user = firebase.auth().currentUser var name, email, photoUrl, emailVerified var db = firebase.firestore(); db.collection('user') .get() .then(snapshot => { const user = [] snapshot.forEach(doc => { const data = doc.data() user.push(data) }) console.log(user[0].name) }) .catch(error => console.log(error)) var aa = String(user[0].name); return (

{aa}

*/ ); } } export default AccInfo;
